column5: This is funny.  Jeff Gordon goes undercover and test drives a car, unbeknownst to the car salesman  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q5mHPo2yDG8
That IS funny and did you notice he even managed to pull off a coupla right turns? YEAH!
I don't think that I would have held it together as well as the sales dude did...but it's hard to hit the guy, when you're pinned to the back of the seat! LOL HH
Luckily Brad Noffsinger from the Richard Petty Racing Experience was the driver, those right turns were no problem
That was fixed, or staged..Just another stupid commercial..How many car dealerships are located on a closed circut road course? I will give Gordo some credit for his driving skills..

It was actually a commercial filmed for Pepsi, so it's totally staged, but made to look like a real hidden camera video.  Gordon wasn't even driving for most of the stunts.  Still funny though.  http://www.slashgear.com/nascars-jeff-gordon-pranks-a-poor-unsuspecting-car-salesman-13273728/  http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/03/14/jeff-gordon-prank-video-pepsi-max-test-drive_n_2876259.html
Should have been a Super Bowl Commercial -but a few million for the TV spot.
